# CopyKit

<!-- badges: start -->

![Copykit Logo](images/copykit_hexsticker_v2.png)

<!-- badges: end -->


*CopyKit* provides a suite of tools for pre-processing, quality control, analysis, and visualization of single cell whole genome DNA sequencing datasets.

## Installation

You can install the development version of CopyKit from github with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("navinlabcode/copykit")
```

## Tutorial

The complete documentation can be found at:
[https://navinlabcode.github.io/CopyKit-UserGuide/](https://navinlabcode.github.io/CopyKit-UserGuide/)
